title: Causing False Positive for PCP
author: Jason
citation: Jason. "Causing False Positive for PCP: experience with DXM & Drug Testing (ID 82821)". Erowid.org. Dec 17, 2009. erowid.org/exp/82821
footer:
[ View as PDF (for printing) ] [ View as LaTeX (for geeks) ]
[ Switch Colors ]
report: Oddly enough I had just had the whole DXM causes false positives for PCP conversation with a friend of mine who was going to take a drug test. I told him I had never experienced this and I am a regular DXM user (daily). I went with him to take his test and wouldn't you know when he came out he had tested positive for PCP. I was blown away. I guess it just depends on how much you have in your system when you take the test. Personally I have taken tests for probation while on DXM with no problems, but I guess this really does happen.
